channel.title: Corral on Bounded-Error Log
channel.description: Recent content in Corral on Bounded-Error Log

item.title: Puzzle 29 / Corral [Antisymmetric Multiplicative]
item.description:
This is a Corral puzzle in which half the clues are multiplicative. For each symmetric pair of clues, one is normal and one is multiplicative.
Hooray for crazy puzzle mutations! As you can probably tell I tried more to put in as many equal symmetric pairs of clues as I could than to play with the logic.
